Pre-Game Insights: Bryan Woo gets the start for the Seattle Mariners on Sunday against Marcus Semien and the Texas Rangers. First pitch is at 2:35 p.m. ET at Globe Life Field. The Rangers are +118 moneyline underdogs for this matchup with the favorite Mariners (-139). Seattle (-1.5) is the favorite on the run line. A 7.5-run over/under has been listed in this matchup.
Mariners have a 58.2% chance to win this game based on the implied probability of the moneyline. Rangers have an implied victory probability of 45.9%.
The Mariners were the moneyline favorite for five of their last 10 games, and they went 4-1 in those matchups. Mariners' ATS record is 6-4-0 over their past 10 games.
